short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store and copy command line with title and description

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Store Command-Line is a handy Chrome extension designed to help you organize, save, and quickly access your frequently used command prompts. Whether youâ€™re a developer, system administrator, or anyone working with terminal commands, this tool simplifies your workflow by providing a structured way to manage and recall your commands.

Key Features:
**************
1. Command Storage: Save your most used terminal commands with a title, description, and the actual command.
2. Search Functionality: Quickly search through saved commands by title, description, or the command itself. Matching words will be highlighted for easier identification.
3. Command Categories: Organize your commands into custom categories. You can also filter commands by category to easily find what you need.
4. Custom Colors for Categories: Choose custom colors for each category to visually organize your commands in a way that suits your style.
5. Copy and Edit Commands: Easily copy commands to your clipboard with one click, or edit them directly within the extension.
6. Command Deletion: Effortlessly remove commands you no longer need.
7. Category Management: Add, edit, or delete categories as you organize your commands. Categories can also be color-coded for better organization.

This extension is perfect for anyone looking to improve their efficiency when working with command prompts. No more scrolling through notes or previous terminal sessionsâ€”your most important commands are stored and categorized right within your browser!
